resources.string:
To begin, please ask your conversational partner to press the "Begin Authentication" button if they have not already done so.


On the next screens, you will be shown a series of words or symbols. Some you will need to read out to your partner, and some your partner will read out to you. You only need to verify that what your partner reads to you matches what you are shown.


You can select what set of words or symbols you would like to use from the dropdown below. Once you and your partner have agreed on a set, press "Next" to continue.
Read this list to your partner:
Which list did your partner read?
Did your partner choose the correct list?
Authentication has been successfully completed. This call is now secure against eavesdropping.

Authentication failed. This probably means someone is eavesdropping. Alternatively, you may just have made too many mistakes during the procedure.\n\n
You should not discuss anything confidential in this call.
Take me back to my call
